rule: The output must only contain the part of speech tag.
input: I will call you tomorrow., will
evaluation:
The chatbot's output is "## Determiner" followed by the word "will." According to the description, the chatbot should provide a part-of-speech tag from the list given. The tag here is "Determiner," which corresponds to "DT" in the list provided in the description. However, the output utilizes a non-standard notation by using "##" and the full word "Determiner" instead of the specified abbreviation "DT." The description also does not mention using any prefix such as "##" before the part-of-speech tag.
